attributes.action: Lee Rigby full military honors funeral and procession
attributes.additional_details: Lee Rigby paid the ultimate sacrifice while serving for this country. He needs to be honored with he most traditional way the United Kingdom can offer. He needs to be immortalised. A message needs to be promoted / sent so that the world understands and takes note of our loyalty for those that stand for our freedom and also the world. I want the United Kingdom to honor Lee Rigby to the best of its ability.
